mil3.6.3:1.2_1: buddho dvattiṁsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi samannāgato asītiyā ca anubyañjanehi parirañjito suvaṇṇavaṇṇo kañcanasannibhattaco byāmappabho”ti?
mil3.6.3:1.3_1: bhagavā dvattiṁsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi samannāgato asītiyā ca anubyañjanehi parirañjito suvaṇṇavaṇṇo kañcanasannibhattaco byāmappabho”ti.
mil3.6.3:2.1_1: mātāpitaropi dvattiṁsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi samannāgatā asītiyā ca anubyañjanehi parirañjitā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā kañcanasannibhattacā byāmappabhā”ti?
mil3.6.3:2.2_1: mātāpitaro dvattiṁsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi samannāgatā asītiyā ca anubyañjanehi parirañjitā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā kañcanasannibhattacā byāmappabhā”ti.
mil3.6.3:3.1_2: na uppajjati buddho dvattiṁsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi samannāgato asītiyā ca anubyañjanehi parirañjito suvaṇṇavaṇṇo kañcanasannibhattaco byāmappabhoti,
mil3.6.3:3.1_3: api ca mātusadiso vā putto hoti mātupakkho vā,
mil3.6.3:3.1_4: pitusadiso vā putto hoti pitupakkho vā”ti.
mil3.6.3:3.7_0: “Kiṁ nu kho, mahārāja, padumaṁ kaddamena sadisaṁ vaṇṇena vā gandhena vā rasena vā”ti?
mil3.6.3:3.9_0: “Atha udakena vā gandhena vā rasena vā”ti?
mil3.6.3:3.11_1: bhagavā dvattiṁsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi samannāgato asītiyā ca anubyañjanehi parirañjito suvaṇṇavaṇṇo kañcanasannibhattaco byāmappabho,
mil3.6.3:3.11_2: no cassa mātāpitaro dvattiṁsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi samannāgatā asītiyā ca anubyañjanehi parirañjitā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā kañcanasannibhattacā byāmappabhā”ti.
